message:
This bot offers a list of continuation options in some messages. Now user just needs to write the number of the answer option in response. I want you to create code that makes this process easier. After the message with the list of options, 4 buttons appear at the bottom, which, after clicking, send a message on behalf of the user with this number. After that, all buttons are removed.
--
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Ultra_Dark_Game_Master~3caabf3f7f36e879b677904293db2d37.gz
